The numbers $ x,\,y,\,z$ are proportional to $ 2,\,3,\,5$. The sum of $ x$, $ y$, and $ z$ is $ 100$. The number $ y$ is given by the equation $ y = ax - 10$. Then $ a$ is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2 \qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{3}{2}\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 3\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{5}{2}\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 4$
